hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: package
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: 所属包，支持多个，用“,”分割

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash repo_owner='fan-xiaoyaya' #shell_path=/home/jenkins/ci_check # 调测可使用以下代码 #shell_path=/home/jenkins/ci_check2 JENKINS_HOME=/home/jenkins OECP_HOME=${JENKINS_HOME}/oecp RPM_PACKAGE=/home/jenkins/agent/workspace/multiarch-ci-test/src-openeuler/${arch}/openssl mkdir -p ${OECP_HOME} mkdir -p ${RPM_PACKAGE}
rm -rf ${OECP_HOME} git clone -b br_symbol https://15336166610:a528553518@gitee.com/openeuler-customization/oecp.git ${OECP_HOME} echo ${MysqlUserPasswd} echo ${MysqldbHost} echo ${MysqldbPort} sed -i "s/dbhost=127.0.0.1/dbhost=114.116.251.180/g" ${OECP_HOME}/oecp/conf/oecp.conf sed -i "s/dbport=3306/dbport=30250/g" ${OECP_HOME}/oecp/conf/oecp.conf pip3 install -i https://repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/pypi/simple -r ${OECP_HOME}/requirement
rm -rf ${RPM_PACKAGE}/*
cat > ${OECP_HOME}/oecp.repo << EOF #[openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1-aarch64] [LTS-SP1_1] name=LTS-SP1_1 baseurl=http://121.36.94.113:82/openEuler:/20.03:/LTS:/SP1/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[LTS-SP1_2] name=LTS-SP1_2 baseurl=http://121.36.94.113:82/openEuler:/20.03:/LTS:/SP1:/Epol/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
#[openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP3-aarch64] [LTS-SP3_1] name=LTS-SP3_1 baseurl=http://121.36.94.113:82/openEuler:/20.03:/LTS:/SP3/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[LTS-SP3_2] name=LTS-SP3_2 baseurl=http://121.36.94.113:82/openEuler:/20.03:/LTS:/SP3:/Epol/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
#[openEuler-22.03-LTS-Next-aarch64] [LTS-Next_1] name=LTS-Next_1 baseurl=http://120.46.140.206:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS:/Next/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[LTS-Next_2] name=LTS-Next_2 baseurl=http://120.46.140.206:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS:/Next:/Epol/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
#[openEuler-22.03-LTS-aarch64] [22_03-LTS_1] name=22_03-LTS_1 baseurl=http://119.3.219.20:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[22_03-LTS_2] name=22_03-LTS_2 baseurl=http://119.3.219.20:82/openEuler:/22.03:/LTS:/Epol/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
#[master-aarch64] [master_1] name=master_1 baseurl=http://119.3.219.20:82/openEuler:/Epol/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[master_2] name=master_2 baseurl=http://119.3.219.20:82/openEuler:/Factory/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0
[master_3] name=master_3 baseurl=http://119.3.219.20:82/openEuler:/Mainline/standard_aarch64/ enabled=1 gpgcheck=0 EOF yum clean all yum makecache
sudo sed -i "s#http://repo.huaweicloud.com#https://repo.huaweicloud.com#g" /etc/yum.repos.d/*.repo grep "repo.huaweicloud.com" -R /etc/yum.repos.d/ if command -v yumdownloader >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo 'exists yumdownloader' else sudo yum install dnf-plugins-core -y fi
#openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1-aarch64分支 ret=`yum list --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --available --repo LTS-SP1_1 | grep -E 'aarch64|noarch' | grep -Ev 'debuginfo|debugsource' |awk '{print $1}' | tr '\n' ' '` yumdownloader --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --repo LTS-SP1_1 --destdir=${RPM_PACKAGE}/LTS-SP1 $ret ret=`yum list --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --available --repo LTS-SP1_2 | grep -E 'aarch64|noarch' | grep -Ev 'debuginfo|debugsource' |awk '{print $1}' | tr '\n' ' '` yumdownloader --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --repo LTS-SP1_2 --destdir=${RPM_PACKAGE}/LTS-SP1 $ret python3 ${OECP_HOME}/cli.py -s openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP1-aarch64 --db-password ${MysqlUserPasswd:5} ${RPM_PACKAGE}/LTS-SP1/
#openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP3-aarch64分支 ret=`yum list --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --available --repo LTS-SP3_1 | grep -E 'aarch64|noarch' | grep -Ev 'debuginfo|debugsource' |awk '{print $1}' | tr '\n' ' '` yumdownloader --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --repo LTS-SP3_1 --destdir=${RPM_PACKAGE}/LTS-SP3 $ret ret=`yum list --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --available --repo LTS-SP3_2 | grep -E 'aarch64|noarch' | grep -Ev 'debuginfo|debugsource' |awk '{print $1}' | tr '\n' ' '` yumdownloader --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --repo LTS-SP3_2 --destdir=${RPM_PACKAGE}/LTS-SP3 $ret python3 ${OECP_HOME}/cli.py -s openEuler-20.03-LTS-SP3-aarch64 --db-password ${MysqlUserPasswd:5} ${RPM_PACKAGE}/LTS-SP3/
#openEuler-22.03-LTS-Next-aarch64分支 ret=`yum list --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --available --repo LTS-Next_1 | grep -E 'aarch64|noarch' | grep -Ev 'debuginfo|debugsource' |awk '{print $1}' | tr '\n' ' '` yumdownloader --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --repo LTS-Next_1 --destdir=${RPM_PACKAGE}/LTS-NEXT $ret ret=`yum list --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --available --repo LTS-Next_2 | grep -E 'aarch64|noarch' | grep -Ev 'debuginfo|debugsource' |awk '{print $1}' | tr '\n' ' '` yumdownloader --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --repo LTS-Next_2 --destdir=${RPM_PACKAGE}/LTS-NEXT $ret python3 ${OECP_HOME}/cli.py -s openEuler-22.03-LTS-Next-aarch64 --db-password ${MysqlUserPasswd:5} ${RPM_PACKAGE}/LTS-NEXT/
#openEuler-22.03-LTS-aarch64分支 ret=`yum list --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --available --repo 22_03-LTS_1 | grep -E 'aarch64|noarch' | grep -Ev 'debuginfo|debugsource' |awk '{print $1}' | tr '\n' ' '` yumdownloader --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --repo 22_03-LTS_1 --destdir=${RPM_PACKAGE}/22_03_LTS $ret ret=`yum list --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --available --repo 22_03-LTS_2 | grep -E 'aarch64|noarch' | grep -Ev 'debuginfo|debugsource' |awk '{print $1}' | tr '\n' ' '` yumdownloader --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --repo 22_03-LTS_2 --destdir=${RPM_PACKAGE}/22_03_LTS $ret python3 ${OECP_HOME}/cli.py -s openEuler-22.03-LTS-aarch64 --db-password ${MysqlUserPasswd:5} ${RPM_PACKAGE}/22_03_LTS/
#master-aarch64分支 ret=`yum list --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --available --repo master_1 | grep -E 'aarch64|noarch' | grep -Ev 'debuginfo|debugsource' |awk '{print $1}' | tr '\n' ' '` yumdownloader --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --repo master_1 --destdir=${RPM_PACKAGE}/master $ret ret=`yum list --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --available --repo master_2 | grep -E 'aarch64|noarch' | grep -Ev 'debuginfo|debugsource' |awk '{print $1}' | tr '\n' ' '` yumdownloader --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --repo master_2 --destdir=${RPM_PACKAGE}/master $ret ret=`yum list --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --available --repo master_3 | grep -E 'aarch64|noarch' | grep -Ev 'debuginfo|debugsource' |awk '{print $1}' | tr '\n' ' '` yumdownloader --setopt=reposdir=${OECP_HOME} --repo master_3 --destdir=${RPM_PACKAGE}/master $ret python3 ${OECP_HOME}/cli.py -s master-aarch64 --db-password ${MysqlUserPasswd:5} ${RPM_PACKAGE}/master/
sudo dnf install -y mariadb mysql -h 114.116.251.180 -uroot -p${MysqlUserPasswd:5} -P 30250 -e "show databases;"
set +x set -e #main set +e set -x
